Articles.Content:
![p5IDEHw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/p5IDEHw.jpg)

Thanks to Dman979 for the inspiration.

This plane is very fun to fly, have fun. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) (Sorry for the lack luster introduction.)

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/F-117-By-AMRSD)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T03:12:20Z" title="06/27/2015 03:12  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**

Nice plane! You didn't have to credit me, but thanks anyway. +Rep!

> 
> you must spread some reputation around...

darn.

> 
> Nice plane! You didn't have to credit me, but thanks anyway. +Rep!
> darn.

You're welcome, and I can wait. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
